banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12

banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: I'm terrified of wanting to be a billionaire

nodes.whoTheyAre: Pardis Parker is a comedian, writer, actor, director and filmmaker.
nodes.whyListen:
A creator across several platforms, comedian Pardis Parker has headlined comedy clubs and theaters in Canada, the US and the UK. As a writer, he’s brought his wit to publications including The New Yorker, The New York Times and The New York Review of Books. His short films and music videos have received more than 80 awards.

A six-time Canadian Comedy Award nominee, Parker is also a frequent guest on Comedy Central's @midnight and a contributing correspondent and writer for CBC's This Hour Has 22 Minutes. He created and starred in Comedy Central’s Mideast Minute, a satirical news show focused on the Middle East. As of 2022, Parker’s next projects include Uncivil, a sitcom he co-created for NBC, and Free, a comedic drama he created for Amazon Prime.

videoData.description: Comedian Pardis Parker presents an unfortunate truth: being rich won't make you a legend. In this rollicking comedy set, he roasts society's obsession with billionaires -- and offers an alternative way to leave a legacy.
videoData.socialDescription: Comedian Pardis Parker presents an unfortunate truth: being rich won't make you a legend. In this rollicking comedy set, he roasts society's obsession with billionaires -- and offers an alternative way to leave a legacy.
